Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2000 ST. JAMES PLACE, HOUSTON, Texas, 77056, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Weatherford International provides diversified oilfield services worldwide for an array of oilfield types. The firm is a global market leader in artificial lift and tubular running services. Other key product lines include cementing products, directional drilling, and wireline evaluation.
